entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Earlton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -29.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Earlton Airport 11:52 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -29.4°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -35.4°C
Wind: NW 30 km/h gust 39 km/h

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Becoming sunny late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
